column5: I was in the area last Sunday, did some tobogganing on a hill with the kids, so there was enough snow.Heading up to check on a family cottage.  Can't drive in, so I'm walking in.  Taking the kids, should I drag them in on a toboggan or are they walking too?  thanks,  Entropy
Hardly any snow left up here.
thanks, guess we might be wheel barrowing stuff in.
Drove thru central Ontario yesterday on the 11.  Snow pretty well disappeared at Huntsville.
